sense.gloss: to go, to move (towards), to head (towards), to leave (for)
to move through, to travel across, to walk along (e.g. a road)
to go (well, badly, etc.), to proceed, to turn out, to get along
to do (in a particular way), to go (with; a choice), to try
to pass (of time, seasons, etc.), to go by
to reach (a stage, extent, age, etc.), to get to, to go (so far as ...)
to reach (of information, instructions, wind, etc.), to arrive
to continue ..., to go on ..., to (progress) steadily, to gradually ..., to progressively ...
to have an orgasm, to come, to cum
to trip, to get high, to have a drug-induced hallucination

sdata.j: この↑世界↑↓せかい↓の↑教育↑↓きょう|いく|↓にはがっかりしてしまう。
sdata.e: Education in this world disappoints me.

sdata.j: ↑時間↑↓じかん↓は|いく|らでも↑作↑↓つく↓れる。
あれは↑最後↑↓さいご↓に|いく|らか↑説明↑↓せつめい↓されたものだ。
sdata.e: That is somewhat explained at the end.

sdata.j: いつかフランスに↑行↑↓|い↓く|ことは↑避↑↓さ↓けられない、それがいつかは↑分↑↓わ↓からないけれど。
sdata.e: It is inevitable that I go to France someday, I just don't know when.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちがそこへ↑行↑↓|い↓く|かどうかを↑決↑↓き↓めるのは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑責任↑↓せきにん↓だ。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.

sdata.j: ↑年月↑↓としつき↓を↑経↑↓へ↓て↑物事↑↓ものごと↓がどう↑変↑↓か↓わって|いく|か↑見↑↓み↓るのは↑面白↑↓おもしろ↓そうだ。
sdata.e: It would be fun to see how things change over the years.

sdata.j: ↑試験↑↓しけん↓が↑教育↑↓きょう|いく|↓を↑駄目↑↓だめ↓にしていると↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think exams are ruining education.

sdata.j: 「ええ、オレンジジュースをお↑願↑↓ねが↓いします」マ|イク|は↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: Yes, orange juice please, says Mike.
